channel.title: Adding a NPC to a 508 server
channel.description:
hey everybody, i just would like to know if there was a way i could add a npc to a 508 server, so it will stay there permenately, please reply back if you know!
[font=trebuchet ms][size=36pt]THANK YOU![/size][/font] :P
